evidence.source_document: Class Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Class Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Congress consolidated U.S. immigration laws into a single text under the Immigration and Nationality Act of 1952 (“INA”).

No document indicates Case No. 1:25-cv-01163 was consolidated with any other case. The term 'consolidated' in the document refers to historical consolidation of immigration laws under the INA, not case consolidation.
